ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.BaseActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveActivity, CreateFriendActivity, CreateItemActivity, CreateListActivity, CreateRecipeActivity, HomeActivity, ItemListActivity, ManageFriendsActivity, ManageRecipeActivity, ShareListActivity, ViewListActivity, ViewRecipeActivity

    public class BaseActivity
extends Activity
    Extension of Activity that allows easy access to the global managers (like ListManager, FriendsManager or SyncManager.

      • setTextViewText

        public void setTextViewText(int id,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Sets a text to a TextView.

        If the TextView with the given id does not exist, a NullPointerException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        id - id of the TextView.
        value - The value to set.

      • getTextViewText

        public java.lang.String getTextViewText(int id)
        Gets the text from the TextView with the given id.

        If the TextView with the given id does not exist, a NullPointerException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        id - id of the TextView.
        Returns:
        The text in the view.

        Checks if the android device has a connection to the internet
        Returns:
